relevant_findings.general: No Acute Distress lying in bed.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Icteric sclera, dry oral mucous membranes, sublingual pallor, and jaundice.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: 2+ radial and DP pulses, 1+ pitting edema of the right foot, no significant edema of the left foot.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Mildly distended, soft and tender to moderate palpation in epigastrium and LUQ, tender to percussion over epigastrium.
relevant_findings.neurological: Awake, alert, conversant, normal attention and good recall, absent asterixis, limited fine-motor control of bilateral hands.
